description:
1. Spacious 3.5 BHK Penthouse 2,900 sqft with 1,800 sqft private terrace located in Platinum City within 5 minutes walking distance from Peenya Metro Station.

14. Large Security force backed by over 100 CCTV cameras and MyGate access control for outsiders makes it safe for occupants and children

15. Located at the intersection of 8 lane Bangalore-Mumbai highway (near the elevated road up ramp) and Outer Ring Road commuting is very convenient. Metro Rail station within 5 minutes walking distance also enables tension free commute anywhere in the city without traffic congestion issues.
